snippet: Bobby Valentine was 69-93, hindered by injuries and a midseason trade of high-salaried players after taking over a club that collapsed the previous September.
abstract: Boston Red Sox fire manager Bobby Valentine after a tumultuous, injury-riddled season.

byline.original: By DAVID WALDSTEIN and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: Bobby Valentine was 69-93, hindered by injuries and a midseason trade of high-salaried players after taking over a club that collapsed the previous September.

headline.seo: Red Sox Fire Bobby Valentine After One Season
headline.main: Valentine Fired by Red Sox After One Trying Season
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Fire Valentine After One Trying Season
